item.description:
Finally our first Happy Hour of Twenty Eleven


Trivia King, Ray says, 'Let's check out the newest game in town at Bleacher Bar, Trivia + Bingo = Trivingo. ' Two classic games combined to form an exciting, nonstop, group game. Past prizes have been Cash, Sox Monster Tix, Gift Cards, and more.


FREE ADMISSION and FREE GAME
YOU MUST BE AT LEAST 21 AND PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU



I'll be get there at 6:30 PM for socializing, so before you go to or come from home, the gym, work, dinner, or wherever, meet up with a few drinking buddies for a minute or two or three or four or more ... however long you're able.

Trivingo begins at 8:00 PM but you're welcome to arrive when you can and stay as long as you're able.

If you're interested in joining a team...please answer the question after you RSVP.

If you come hungry, here's the food and beer menu. There is also a special bucket of ponys for $20 in addition to a respectable assortment of bottled beer.

Bleacher Bar is unique because it is located beneath the Fenway Park bleachers in center field. There's a window that looks directly through centerfield and into the park, it is the only view of its kind.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Nearest subway station Kenmore on the Green Line, which is about a ten (10) minute walk.
item.name: Trivingo Happy Hour on Thursday January 20
